short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mighty is a powerful little Google Chrome extension designed to elevate your content in Articulate Rise 360.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the full potential of your Articulate Rise 360 courses with Mighty. 

Upon creating a Mighty account, you can seamlessly integrate it into your courses for an expanded and enriched authoring experience. 

Best of all, trying Mighty in Rise 360 is free! Simply install the Mighty extension, log in to Rise 360, and let Mighty accompany you on your course-building journey.

Learn more at https://maestrolearning.com/mighty
